projects.name: MONETIS
projects.description: MONETIS is a secure and user-friendly platform for testing and managing finances. It’s ideal for test automators, offering tools to simulate, validate, and monitor financial transactions with ease.

projects.name: QWiFi-Code
projects.description: QWiFi is a tool that generates QR codes to facilitate access to WiFi networks. Simply scan the QR code with your smartphone to connect automatically.

projects.name: YOCO PHOTO - Portfolio
projects.description: A fully integrated photography portfolio website featuring a robust, user-friendly dashboard for seamless management of all site content and data.

projects.name: KOVA Coffee - Concept
projects.description: Brewed with love and care, our coffee is more than just a drink. It’s a way to bring people together. This concept website, powered by a modern frontend integrated with Strapi CMS, showcases how technology and passion blend seamlessly to create a digital experience as rich as the coffee itself.
